com.echsylon.atlantis

Class MockRequest.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.echsylon.atlantis.MockRequest.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    MockRequest

    public static final class MockRequest.Builder
extends Object
    This class offers means of building a request template directly from code (as opposed to configure one in a JSON file).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Builder()
      Creates a new builder based on an uninitialized request template object.
      Builder(MockRequest source)
      Creates a new builder based on the provided mock request object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MockRequest.Builder addHeader(String key, String value)
      Adds a header to the request template being built.
      MockRequest.Builder addHeaders(Map<String,List<String>> headers)
      Adds all headers to the request template being built where neither the key nor the value is empty or null.
      MockRequest.Builder addHeaders(String key, List<String> values)
      Adds all non-empty header keys and values to the mock request being built.
      MockRequest.Builder addHeaders(String key, String... values)
      Adds all non-empty header keys and values to the mock request being built.
      MockRequest.Builder addResponse(MockResponse mockResponse)
      Adds a mock mockResponse to the request template being built.
      MockRequest build()
      Returns a sealed request template object which can not be further built on.
      MockRequest.Builder setHeader(String key, String value)
      Adds a header to the mock request being built, replacing any and all existing values for the same key.
      MockRequest.Builder setMethod(String method)
      Sets the method of the request template being built.
      MockRequest.Builder setResponseFilter(MockResponse.Filter responseFilter)
      Sets the response filter logic of the request template being built.
      MockRequest.Builder setSetting(String key, String value)
      Adds a setting to the mock request being built.
      MockRequest.Builder setSettings(Map<String,String> settings)
      Adds all non-empty settings to the mock response being built.
      MockRequest.Builder setUrl(String url)
      Sets the url of the request template being built.

    • Method Detail

      • setHeader

        public MockRequest.Builder setHeader(String key,
                                     String value)
        Adds a header to the mock request being built, replacing any and all existing values for the same key.
        Parameters:
        key - The header key.
        value - The new header value.
        Returns:
        This builder instance, allowing chaining of method calls.

      • addHeader

        public MockRequest.Builder addHeader(String key,
                                     String value)
        Adds a header to the request template being built. Doesn't add anything if the key or value is empty or null.
        Parameters:
        key - The header key.
        value - The header value.
        Returns:
        This builder instance, allowing chaining of method calls.

      • addHeaders

        Parameters:
        key - The header key.
        values - The header values.
        Returns:
        This builder instance, allowing chaining of method calls.

        Parameters:
        key - The header key.
        values - The header values.

        This builder instance, allowing chaining of method calls.

      • addHeaders

        public MockRequest.Builder addHeaders(Map<String,List<String>> headers)
        Adds all headers to the request template being built where neither the key nor the value is empty or null.
        Parameters:
        headers - The headers to add.
        Returns:
        This builder instance, allowing chaining of method calls.

      • setSetting

        public MockRequest.Builder setSetting(String key,
                                      String value)
        Adds a setting to the mock request being built. Any existing value with the same key will be overwritten.
        Parameters:
        key - The setting key.
        value - The setting value.
        Returns:
        This builder instance, allowing chaining of method calls.

      • setSettings

        public MockRequest.Builder setSettings(Map<String,String> settings)
        Adds all non-empty settings to the mock response being built. Any existing values with the same keys will be overwritten.
        Parameters:
        settings - The settings to add.
        Returns:
        This builder instance, allowing chaining of method calls.

      • addResponse

        public MockRequest.Builder addResponse(MockResponse mockResponse)
        Adds a mock mockResponse to the request template being built.
        Parameters:
        mockResponse - The mockResponse to add.
        Returns:
        This builder instance, allowing chaining of method calls.

      • setMethod

        public MockRequest.Builder setMethod(String method)
        Sets the method of the request template being built.
        Parameters:
        method - The new HTTP request method.
        Returns:
        This builder instance, allowing chaining of method calls.

      • setUrl

        public MockRequest.Builder setUrl(String url)
        Sets the url of the request template being built.
        Parameters:
        url - The new url.
        Returns:
        This builder instance, allowing chaining of method calls.

      • setResponseFilter

        public MockRequest.Builder setResponseFilter(MockResponse.Filter responseFilter)
        Sets the response filter logic of the request template being built. This filter can be used when deciding which mock response to serve.
        Parameters:
        responseFilter - The response filter implementation.
        Returns:
        This builder instance, allowing chaining of method calls.

      • build

        public MockRequest build()
        Returns a sealed request template object which can not be further built on.
        Returns:
        The final request template object.
